name: gravity
description: Gravity is a lightweight DNS and filtering proxy service for blocking malware, ads, and tracking. Designed for home networks and privacy enthusiasts, it supports per-device rules, stats, and a modern web UI.
features: DNS Filtering: Block ads, trackers, and malware at the network level before they reach devices.
Per-Device Rules: Configure different filtering policies for individual devices or groups.
Modern Interface: Manage DNS settings through a clean, responsive web UI.
Blocklist Management: Subscribe to curated blocklists or create custom filtering rules.
Query Logging: View DNS query logs to understand network traffic and troubleshoot issues.
Statistics Dashboard: Monitor blocked queries, top domains, and filtering effectiveness.
Privacy Protection: Prevent tracking and telemetry at the DNS level for all network devices.
Lightweight Proxy: Minimal resource usage suitable for home networks and small offices.
